body_html: @DutAlex : Just to confirm: When you say there is "no impact" you mean that you see all of the GPU memory being allocated by the JVM process (as reported by nvidia-smi)? Could you post some more detail on how you're running the program and observing the change?
body_text: @DutAlex : Just to confirm: When you say there is "no impact" you mean that you see all of the GPU memory being allocated by the JVM process (as reported by nvidia-smi)? Could you post some more detail on how you're running the program and observing the change?
body: @DutAlex : Just to confirm: When you say there is "no impact" you mean that you see all of the GPU memory being allocated by the JVM process (as reported by `nvidia-smi`)? Could you post some more detail on how you're running the program and observing the change?
